name: BreakThru [NES]
description: BreakThru (ブレーク スルー, Bureikusurū) is a Data East vehicular combat arcade game that was later made available for the Nintendo Entertainment System and various personal computers. The goal is to drive a dune buggy to "breakthru" the enemy lines of five different areas. The five areas are "Mountain", "Bridge", "Prairie" (labeled as "Jungle" in early advertising), "City" and "Recover the Aircraft".
